index.title: Home
index.description: UI engineer Felix Berger from Berlin.
index.aboutContent1: Hi, I'm Felix Berger - an independent UI engineer living in Berlin.
index.aboutContent2: I build inclusive and engaging products for the web [...].
index.skillsContent1: As a developer with experience working on large scale web frontends, I support projects with performant and maintainable code. I apply progressive enhancement techniques and my expertise gathered in 10 years of accessible web development to guarantee broad acess to digital experiences.
index.skillsContent2: As a former information architect, I have the ability to bridge the gap between design and implementation. I help brands building semantic architecture and interfaces that are both effective and easy to use.
